direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods provide access to core properties of the CucumberExpression object.
Both methods involve processing and returning information related to the expression.
Both methods handle the transformation of expression-related data but in different formats.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the ParameterTypeRegistry is often required before accessing expression properties.
Parsing the expression string is a prerequisite for accessing its source.
Both methods verify the format of the expression and handle similar exceptions.
